statements: UPDATE VoterVerification SET first_name='John', last_name='Doe', address='123 Main St', eligibility_status=true WHERE voter_id=101;

UPDATE voter SET age = 25, first_name = 'John' WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE voter_registration SET verification_status = TRUE, registration_date = '2022-06-15' WHERE registration_id = 3;
UPDATE voter SET last_name = 'Doe', age = 30, address = '123 Main St.', eligible_to_vote = true WHERE voter_id = 1001;

UPDATE Voter SET age = 30 WHERE voter_id = 1;
UPDATE Voter SET last_name = 'Smith', address = '123 Main Street' WHERE voter_id = 2;
UPDATE Voter SET age = age + 1, address = '123 Main St' WHERE voter_id = 1001;
UPDATE VoterEligibility SET is_eligible = true, eligibility_reason = 'Citizen of the country' WHERE voter_id = 1001;
UPDATE voters SET address='123 Main St' WHERE voter_id=1;
UPDATE voters SET date_of_birth='1990-09-15' WHERE voter_name='Alice';
UPDATE voters SET address='123 Main St', date_of_birth='2000-05-15' WHERE voter_id=1001;

UPDATE voter_information SET address = '123 Main St', is_registered = TRUE, first_name = 'John' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE voter_history SET voting_frequency = 2, last_voted_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE voter_id = 3;
